General.Name: Rotshtein
General.Description: Rotshtein Realestate Ltd develops and constructs residential projects in Israel. It also undertakes engineering works. The company was formerly known as D. Rothstein Company and changed its name to Rotshtein Realestate Ltd in February 2013. Rotshtein Realestate Ltd was incorporated in 1961 and is based in Petah Tikva, Israel. Rotshtein Realestate Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Avnei Shoham Development Ltd.
General.Address: Yanai Park Building 6, Petah Tikva, Israel

1.Name: Mr. Roy  Tuizer
